safetyTips: Maintaining two metres, even when delivering, and over the phone payment by Card.
name: MARCHANTS OF BETHERSDEN LTD
description: We are a Butchers, Deli and Grocery Shop based in Bethersden. We are doing local deliveries free of charge in our own, refrigerated vans to local area with-in 15 miles radius of the shop. You can also collect from the shop and pay on Collection. Order by phone or on our website.
